entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 11:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SSE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:38 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:38 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:38 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
